development-stage: either development, prototype, certified or production
certificate: link to (e.g. OSHWA) certificate if exitent
standard: name used standards (not DIN SPEC 3105) if that's the case
assembly-instruction: link to resource e.g. drawing &/ guide
version: only if git version tag is unavailable or untrue
spdx-license: only if information is unavailable from GitHub/GitLab API
readme: only if information is unavailable from GitHub/GitLab API or untrue
repo: only if information is unavailable from GitHub/GitLab API or untrue
